mapper.select: select distinct sidoName from sidocode order by sidoName;
select distinct gugunName from dongcode where sidoName = #{sido} order by gugunName;
select distinct dongName from dongCode where sidoName = #{sidoName} and gugunName = #{gugunName} order by dongName;

select d.sidoName sidoName, d.gugunName gugunName, hi.dong dongName, hi.apartmentName aptName, hd.dealYear dealYear, hd.dealAmount dealAmount, hi.lng lng, hi.lat lat from houseinfo hi inner join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode inner join dongcode d on hi.dong = d.dongName where d.sidoName = #{sidoName} and d.gugunName = #{gugunName} and hi.dong=#{dongName};

select d.sidoName sidoName, d.gugunName gugunName, hi.dong dongName, hi.apartmentName aptName, hd.dealYear dealYear, hd.dealAmount dealAmount, hi.lng lng, hi.lat lat from houseinfo hi inner join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode inner join dongcode d on hi.dong = d.dongName where d.sidoName = #{sidoName} and d.gugunName = #{gugunName} and hi.dong=#{dongName} and hi.apartmentName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%');
